components.title: 廠外施工 餐飲．津貼

components.label: 報價金額
components.calculateValue: value = data['panel2'] + data['panel4'] + data['panel6'] + data['panel8'] + data['panel10'] + data['panel12'] + data['panel14'] + data['panel17'];

components.label: 工案名稱
components.calculateValue: if (data.panel18Table3) {const projectId = data.panel18Table3; const url = `http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/project/${projectId}`; fetch(url) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((projectData) => { if (projectData) { data.panel21 = projectId;} }) } return data.panel18Table3;

components.label: 工程款
components.calculateValue: const projectId = data.panel21; if (projectId) { return fetch(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/project/${projectId}`).then(response => response.json()).then(projectData => parseInt(projectData.amount) || 0).catch(error => { console.error('Error fetching project data:', error); return 0; }); } return 0;
